name: workspaces-mcp
description: Intelligent workspace management and automatic context loading for Claude Desktop
long_description:
# Workspaces MCP

A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides intelligent workspace management and automatic context loading for Claude Desktop. Organize your development projects, manage shared instruction templates, and seamlessly load contextual information into Claude conversations.

## Features

- **Automatic Context Loading**: Instantly load project context into Claude conversations
- **Workspace Organization**: Structured project management with templates
- **Shared Instructions**: Reusable instruction templates for different project types
- **Global Configuration**: Centralized settings that apply across all workspaces
- **Developer-Friendly**: Built with TypeScript, comprehensive testing, and modern tooling

## Perfect For

- Software developers managing multiple projects
- Teams sharing common development patterns
- Anyone wanting organized, contextual AI conversations
- Projects requiring consistent coding standards and practices
